price: showing their ingratitude to what We have given them and enjoy themselves, but they will soon come to know.
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
